item.description:
I am setting up a Mastermind group for my Meetup people. Mastergroup give a place to get to know each other share ideas and support each other. This requires people who want to built relationships with others to assist each others in growth. I will be at Panera Bread everyweek if other can't make it at 9am we can set up another for you. This is explaination of a Mastermind Group is from The book The power of Focus:

The primary purpose for the group is to establish support for each other emotionally, Personally and professionally. I also provides a unique forum for sharing ideas and information, as well as discussing meaningful topics and everyday challenges. (Canfield, Hansen, Hewitt 2000)
item.name: Mastermind Group
